name: Gmate
body:
# GMate

This package contains some gedit improvements to make it more similar to
TextMate. The package contain code snippets, plugins, and an automatic
registration of rails-related files.

If you have issues with one of the plugins included in Gmate or have suggestions
please fill an issue in <http://github.com/gmate/gmate/issues>

## This Fork

This is a fork of the Gmate project to port the remaining plugins to Gedit3. While the master branch is stable, all other branches are experimental and not meant for production environments.

**If you want to download the most stable and up-to-date version of Gmate for everyday use, visit the main Gmate repo at <http://github.com/gmate/gmate>.**
tagline: Set of plugins and improvements to make Gedit a powerful programmer text editor
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
